name: Plan
body:
### Plan
Plan is an open source project for Eclipse allowing you to easily define plans and schedules in the same way you code. Plan is a Domain Specific Language (DSL), specifically designed to represents aspects of project plans like activities, dependencies, checkpoints, etc.

The editor of the Plan language is based on XText and includes: 
* keyword highlights;
* code completion;
* tree baed outline;

Plan integrates the Nebula Gantt View allowing for a realtime graphical representation of the plan you are defining.

<iframe width="854" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BFFt2gyQW0s" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

###Installation
The best thing you can do is to start from the Eclipse Mars version called "[IDE for Java and DSL Developers](http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-and-dsl-developers/mars1)" which already includes XText. Run it and press the Help->"Install new Softwares" menu, in the dialog that will pop up you will have to add a new repository.

Use this update site "http://lowcoupling.github.io/plan/com.lowcoupling.plan.compositeRepository/"
To download and install both the Nebula Widgets and Plan
